Data Fields
CSR_MESH_APPEARANCE_T Struct Reference
CSRmesh&trade; » Core Stack

CSRmesh Device Appearance. The Appearance is a 24-bit value that is composed of an "organization" and an "organization appearance".

Data Fields

CsrUint8 organization
 Identifies the organization which assigns device appearance values.
 
CsrUint16 value
 Appearance value.
 
CsrUint32 deviceHash
 deviceHash of remote device
